long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Translate words on the go, with support for multiple AIs. Save words, add notes, and improve your language skills while you read.
致力于辅助外文阅读和学习，提供词典、翻译、单词收藏、单词笔记和记忆等功能。

开源地址：https://github.com/chengfengfengwang/lingo-link
